plot outline: Watch the full movie, Bhale Adrushtavo Adrushta, only on Eros Now. Bhale Adrushtavo Adrushta is a 2004 Indian Kannada film, directed by Gunakumar and produced by K S Kumar. The film stars Kalpana, B V Radha, Gangadhar and Srinath in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya Bhaskar.
